data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the Across the King's Garden.
Heavily forested with dense undergrowth that stretches for miles. A cool mist enshrouds the trees and shrubs. The sounds of birds chirping fills the air and in the distance, the rumbling of a waterfall can be heard.
There's a shrub and a tree here.
The officer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to welcome the officer
data.mid_motivation: I want to get the officer's report today
data.long_motivation: I plan to trot out all the spies in the kingdom in the coming weeks
